message.body: Hi Sarah, sorry to write you and bother you, I'm sure you are dealing with everyone you have ever known right now, so no need to respond to this. I just wanted you to know that I'm am thinking about you and Im hoping everything goes perfectly for your procedure. If you need me to do anything like feed Sam, run errands or transport you anywhere just let me know, I'm right up the street. sorry to txt u but I'm on a bus. Best wishes and get well soon. Xo #####
Thanks soooo much for reaching out! It means a lot to me. Xo
No problem, just recover quickly and ##################### me
Ohhhh thank you! I will look forward to that!
